text: Caroline Haslett was born on 17 August 1895. Caroline was an engineer. ==Life== Her parents were Mr and Mrs Robert. She grew up wanting to be an inspiring woman to other people. There is a school named after her in Milton Keynes. She loved fixing stuff when she was young. Caroline Haslett died on January 4th 1957. ==Other websites== *Women's Engineering Society *Profile: Caroline Haslett *Engineering Timelines *Women Engineer Archive *IET Archives biography of Caroline Haslett Category:British electrical engineers Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:British feminists Category:1895 births Category:1957 deaths Category:People from West Sussex
title: Caroline Haslett
